description:
Casual style but built to handle the water, trail, or your backyard. Breathable side and back panels keep you cool on the water and UPF 50+ fabric offers coverage from harsh sun rays.

  • Quick-drying nylon and polyester blend has stretch to move with you
  • Recycled Silkweight fabric under arms and on back for extra ventilation
  • Provides UPF 50+ sun protection
  • Snap chest pockets
name: NRS Guide Short Sleeve Shirt - Women's
